actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1306(a) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize the investment of the war risk insurance fund in securities of, or guaranteed by, the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the investment of the war risk insurance fund established for aircraft protection, under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, in securities of, or guaranteed by, the United States. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1536(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1306(a) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to authorize the investment of the war risk insurance fund in securities of, or guaranteed by, the United States.
